pageContext.claim: “Last year alone, ICE removed nearly 130,000 criminal aliens from our country … including thousands of vicious gang members and MS-13 predators.”
pageContext.analysis: Trump's figure is iffy because 60,000 of those 130,000 individuals were apprehended at the border in fiscal 2017. A range of data shows Trump’s crackdown on MS-13 has had a discernible impact. But there’s nothing showing that “thousands and thousands” of the gang’s members have been deported or imprisoned since the president took office. Instead, it's in the "hundreds and hundreds" ballpark.
